verbose_text: In this study, we hypothesize that the plasmid DNA induced overexpression of T-bet, GATA-3 and TGF-beta induces Th1, Th2 and Th17 like responses in Atlantic salmon and that this overexpression might modulate the level of protection against an experimental challenge with intracellular (P. salmonis) and extracellular (V. anguillarum) bacteria.
